describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

provenance.description: Provenance information provided by the system.

genus_species.description: The scientific binomial name for the species of the organoid.

model_organ.description: Organ for which this organoid is a model system.

model_organ_part.description: Organ part for which this organoid is a model system.

age.description: Age of the organoid in Organoid age unit measured from when cell aggregates started differentiating to desired organoid model.

age_unit.description: The unit in which Organoid age is expressed.

size.description: Size of the organoid in Organoid size unit.

size_unit.description: The unit in which the Organoid size is expressed.

morphology.description: General description of the organoid morphology.
morphology.example: Epithelial monolayer with budding crypt-like domains; Optic cup structure

embedded_in_matrigel.description: Whether the organoid is embedded in a matrigel.
embedded_in_matrigel.example: Should be one of: yes, no.

growth_environment.description: Growth environment in which the organoid is grown.

input_aggregate_cell_count.description: Estimated number of cells per input cell aggregate.

stored_oxygen_levels.description: Percent oxygen level organoid was stored in prior to sequencing.
